title: Lynda - Content Marketing: Slides
description:
Lynda - Content Marketing: Slides

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

33m 18s Appropriate for all Oct 08, 2015 | Uploaded in Dec 2, 2015 by 2boweb
Subject: Marketing 
Software: PowerPoint SlideShare 
Author: Dayna Rothman 
 
Whether you build them in PowerPoint, Keynote, or an online platform like SlideShare, it's the quality of your slides that determines whether the audience hears your messageâ€”or simply falls asleep. In this short course, Dayna Rothman goes over the best practices for creating and promoting content through slides. She teaches how to outline a presentation; choose the right text and images; and create, share, and promote your presentation. Start watching to learn how to make your next slide deck educating and entertaining.
